segments.text: Hello . Is this Ann ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . Kelly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a cold ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Worse than that . I have a flu . I'm in bed with a fever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! What about your presentation today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to do it , of course . But I just can't . I'm afraid I'd fall down in the middle of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . What should I tell Mr . Morley ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not just tell him I'm sick ? I'll ring him myself this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . Have you been to see a doctor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . I feel too lousy to go out.Anyway , I have a flu . I know what it is . I don't need a doctor to tell me that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think you'll be able to come in tomorrow ? Or should I call off your appointments for tomorrow too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure yet.Maybe this will all be gone in a day.So it's probably better if you don't call off my appointments . I will call you later this afternoon and tell you what I think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's rainy weather today . Maybe it's better if you just stay inside.Make yourself some chicken soup and sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's what I plan to do . Except I won't make the chicken soup.Right now I don't think I could swallow more than a spoonful of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That bad , huh ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I'm very nauseous . It's mostly nausea and a fever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll cancel your appointments for today . And I'll tell Mr . Morley .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Ann . Talk to you this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hope you feel better .
segments.speaker: S2
